The newly updated Gold Backpack in Apex Legends does allow you to carry more gear, but it also makes Mirage’s passive ability practically useless at the same time.

articles.author: Mitchell Clark
articles.title: Companies can silently reroute your texts to hackers, sometimes for just $16 - The Verge
articles.description: Motherboard has found that SMS redirect services, often aimed toward businesses, can be used by hackers to silently read a victim’s text messages. The carriers seemingly don’t want to take any responsibility.
articles.content:
Its an industry aimed at businesses, but its open to nefarious uses
Illustration by Alex Castro / The Verge
Theres a newly discovered attack on SMS messaging thats almost invisible to victims, and … [+3080 chars]

articles.author: Malcolm Owen
articles.title: Porting operating systems to Apple Silicon leagues harder than migrating software - AppleInsider
articles.description: Working with Apple Silicon directly is a tough task, a developer attempting to port Linux to run natively on the M1 chip advises, with Apple using a highly customized process to boot the Mac that is different from versions used by other 64-bit ARM systems.
